title: Lies of Corporate Media | Guest Host: Jason Whitlock | Guest: Steve Deace | 12/23/21
description:
The Blaze’s Jason Whitlock guest host the Glenn Beck Program. Whitlock breaks down what shaped him as a man and as a sports writer. Kyle Rittenhouse has been a hot topic in the media over the past few weeks, Jason discusses his thoughts on the situation and gun rights. The Blaze’s Steve Deace joins the show to discuss a recent USA Today article and the real COVID facts. How many lies were told about January 6th? Then Jason Whitlock takes your calls! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
